document_data.mainbody:
Graygruun was an island within the kingdom of Norheim in the Moonshae Isles.
Graygruun was found toward the center of Norheim just east of the large island of Giantspine. It sat at the end of Northwind Strait where the Sea of Moonshae met the Trackless Sea. Graygruun was only  long and about  wide.
* Greystaad
